channel.title: Comments on: Moving ubuntu to garage

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
Actually I start to worry about summer time - it will be pretty hot during summer in Pleasanton, and garage will be hotter as there is nothing can cool it down.
I'm thinking of some better solutions, maybe put the ubuntu box onto the roof :D

Actually I start to worry about summer time – it will be pretty hot during summer in Pleasanton, and garage will be hotter as there is nothing can cool it down.
